page.title: 12SETTLEMENT
page.content: Highnam village has grown very con- siderably in the last decade due to the estate development by Bovis and Lovell Homes.Before this growth Highnam focused on Highnam Court and the associated functions of the estate:the farms,cottages,church & school.Even in 1985 with the new housing nearing completion there is only one general store to serve the largely commuter population who work in Gloucester or further afield. Tibberton,by contrast,presents a straggling appearance with many gaps betwwen buildings which are of mixed age.There are signs that this village too is beginning to serve as housing for folk who work at some distance from the village.The appeal of the country continues for urban folk, helping to infill villages and raise property values.
